content: पराजि {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To defeat, conquer, overcome, subdue; यं पराजयसे मृषा <ls>Y. 2. 75</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 9</ls>; <ls>Śi. 19. 82.</ls> {@--2@} To lose, be deprived of. {@--3@} To be conquered or overcome by, find (something) unbearable; अध्ययनात्पराजयते <ls>Sk.</ls> ‘finds it unbearable or difficult to study’; <ls>Bk. 8. 71.</ls> {@--4@} To submit or yield to.
